long_description: herzlich willkommen . . . . . . bei uns im bayerischen wald, an der sonnenseite des hohen bogen. lassen sie sich verwöhnen . .. in unserem urigen bierstüberl . . . ...genießen sie ein frisch gezapftes bay. sport, spaß und geselligkeit . .. urlaub im bayerischen wald . ..
generated_description: kollmerhof is a family-run hotel located in rimbach, bavaria. situated in the bavarian forest, it offers a range of accommodations suitable for all seasons. the hotel features comfortable rooms, a cozy restaurant, and a traditional beer garden. kollmerhof provides various activities and entertainment for guests, including sports and social events. the hotel also offers parking facilities for both cars and buses.
